text.section: Any breach by a credit services business of a contract under this subtitle, or of any obligation arising under it, shall constitute a violation of this subtitle.

Any contract for services from a credit services business that does not comply with the applicable provisions of this subtitle shall be void and unenforceable as contrary to the public policy of this State.

section.section: Any waiver by a consumer of any of the provisions of this subtitle shall be deemed void and unenforceable by a credit services business as contrary to the public policy of this State; and
Any attempt by a credit services business to have a consumer waive rights given by this subtitle shall constitute a violation of this subtitle.

text.section: In any proceeding involving this subtitle, the burden of proving an exemption or an exception from a definition is upon the person claiming it.
